tagline: Web app for KIJ2013: Kent International Jamboree 2013
name: KIJ2013
body:
### Welcome to the Support pages for the KIJ2013 Smartphone App
KIJ2013 is an International Scout Jamboree to be held in Kent in August 2013. It will be attended be over 4000 participants representing more than a dozen countries.

As part of the Jamboree a smartphone app has been produced to complement the experience. The source code for the app has been published on [github](http://github.com/KIJ2013/KIJ2013/).

These pages are intended as a support resource for the app. Material will be mainly from a technical perspective. To some extent this documentation will constitute a specification.

The source code can be obtained with:
```
$ git clone git://github.com/IJMacD/KIJ2013.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
Most of the code in this project was written by Iain MacDonald (@IJMacD) in 2012 and 2013.

### Support or Contact
If you need to get in contact directly with the developer you can contact him at IJMacD+KIJ2013@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
